subject:
[cc-devel] [ cctools-Feature Requests-1723155 ] Make captcha
	pluggable
body:
Feature Requests item #1723155, was opened at 2007-05-21 17:28
Message generated for change (Tracker Item Submitted) made by Item Submitter

https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?func=detail&atid=559969&aid=1723155&group_id=80503

Please note that this message will contain a full copy of the comment thread,
including the initial issue submission, for this request,
not just the latest update.
Category: ccHost
Group: None
Status: Open
Priority: 6
Private: No
Submitted By: Jon Phillips (kidproto)
Assigned to: Victor Stone (fourstones)
Summary: Make captcha pluggable

Initial Comment:
Yes, the captcha should be made as a plugin rather than as default, so that others can improve, but also, so ccHost is more stripped down by default.
